baroque- there was lots of ornamentation because the harpsichord didn't have a way to sustain notes and the composers needed to find a way to make the pieces interesting. since the harpsichord strings are plucked and not hit, there was no way to use dynamics and therefore baroque music has very little or limited use of dynamic control. there would be a shorter range (yet again because of the harpsichord). a contrapuntal texture. a flowing, simple melody. will have a continuo.

classical-regular structure, mainly homophonic texture, diatonic harmony, sometimes the use of an alberti base.

romantic- lots of dynamics, rubato, use of the pedal, rich chords, thick texture, dramatic.

if i'm not too late, i hope this helps ! :)

im so sorry. i know it's complicated because he's your father but that's really awful and if you're unsafe you need to report him. as someone who had a similar situation with a family member, i really wish i'd said something because i still feel unsafe in my own home. it's been years. the feeling doesn't go away. please reach out to someone you know and try to find somewhere else to stay or a way to be away from him for as long as possible. my dms are always open if you need (heart_emoji)
couldn't have said it better myself.

you can't put a timer on when your life will turn around. maybe it will take a few weeks. maybe a year. or maybe it will even happen tomorrow. the future is uncertain, and that's what makes it so scary, but don't give up before you've given yourself a fair chance of finding that thing that will make your life complete. i know none of this will help because many people would tell you the same thing, but it's the only advice i can offer you right now. i'm sorry you feel that way. i can't cure it but if you ever need to talk, i'm always here. and if you do decide to end it, i hope you've experienced the things you always wanted to experience. i hope you'll be ok.

my friends lied to me so they could hang out without me
WRITING.TEXT.Element:Text: i was sitting with two of my friends in my room last night (i go to a boarding school) and i heard one of them whisper “should we say we’re going to bed?” then they both got up and left. i walked down the corridor to get to the kitchen because i had nothing else to do until i could fall asleep and i heard them whispering and giggling in one of their rooms. i don’t know why they’d do it or what i couldn’t hear, especially since one of them is my best friend and tells me absolutely everything. i’m not sure if they were talking about me or not. the thing is, it would have been fine if they just told me they wanted to go talk together or whatever but it’s the fact that they specifically lied about it to me. i was 5 days clean. not anymore.

personally, latin is my favourite subject and i plan to take it for A level. we have quite a small class and the lessons are always really fun because there's the right balance of learning and pissing around. i think everyone there appreciates that it's a bit of a geeky subject but that's why we love it ! hopefully we're going on a trip to rome soon too. can't wait. i actually have latin right now. anyway, sorry i can't really help. i'd say to try and make the lessons more engaging (if you can) and if they're not enjoying it, ask why they took the subject in the first place. someone who doesn't want to learn probably won't learn, so you need to make the environment exciting if it already isn;t. have a great day :)

WRITING.TEXT.Element:Text: your parents are refusing to buy you food at 16? bloody hell. that's kinda fucked man. i hope you're ok. if you don't feel right, it doesn't matter what the doctors say. not to be a hypocrite or anything, but in order to get better you need to not only have a healthy relationship with food but also exercise and your body. if looking to gain weight, foods like rice pudding and bread which are high in carbs will help because your body will burn the carbs instead of burning fat. also bear in mind that you can gain weight in muscle too which is good for your body. not sure if this helped, but i hope you can get better anyway. im rooting for you man.
